definitions.definition: Sudden fatigue as a result of glycogen depletion from not having taken in enough nutrition.
An abrupt rapping sound, as from an impact of a hard object against wood.
definitions.example: I heard a knock on my door.
He took a knock on the head.

definitions.definition: Preignition, a type of abnormal combustion occurring in spark ignition engines caused by self-ignition; also, the characteristic knocking sound associated with it.

definitions.example: He played a slow but sure knock of 35.

definitions.definition: To strike for admittance; to rap upon, as a door.
To criticize verbally; to denigrate; to undervalue.
definitions.example: Don’t knock it until you’ve tried it.

definitions.definition: To kick a ball towards another player; to pass.
To impress forcibly or strongly; to astonish; to move to admiration or applause.

definitions.example: I accidentally knocked my drink off the bar.

definitions.definition: To rap one's knuckles against something, especially wood.
definitions.example: Knock on the door and find out if they’re home.
